Package app.adapter

Class BarcodeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.adapter.BarcodeAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BarcodeExternalModule
    public class BarcodeAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements BarcodeExternalModule
    This class allows the communication between barbecue library. This class is not that essential but needs to be created for the System to support other APIs in case if he needs it.
    Author:
    Miguel Ramos <1201247@isep.ipp.pt>

      • getBarcode

        public java.lang.String getBarcode()
                            throws net.sourceforge.barbecue.output.OutputException,
                                   net.sourceforge.barbecue.BarcodeException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Method that create and return the barcode generated by the BarbecueAPI (with library methods).
        Specified by:
        getBarcode in interface BarcodeExternalModule
        Returns:
        barcode generated by BarbecueAPI.
        Throws:
        net.sourceforge.barbecue.output.OutputException - Exception because of the output given by barcode.
        net.sourceforge.barbecue.BarcodeException - Exception that needs to be throw because of barbecue library
        java.io.IOException - Exception because of the input to create a barcode.
